description.en: More than a crypto-currency alone, SCRIV is an ever-expanding blockchain eco-system that delivers state-of-the-art Data Verification, Time-Stamping, High Return on Investment Masternodes, a Shared Masternodes Staking Service (SOS), and IPFS - InterPlanetary File Sharing Network.

Hey scrivians üëã  There are some cool news for you today üêã

$SCRIV is now available at ZCore mobile ‚Äî the non-custodial wallet for your crypto ‚Äî https://zcore.app/SCRIV

Features available:
‚úÖ Send and receive your SCRIV
‚úÖ  Hold SCRIV at multiple addresses
‚úÖ  Host SCRIV masternodes at 1.49 USD/month
‚úÖ  Sign messages in Scriv blockchain

Hello Scrivians üôå

There are two exciting updates for you:
üîπ We are establishing the Community Fund (to be filled from StackOfStake revenue) ‚Äî from now, anyone can contribute to the growth of the Scriv Network and receive the funding for contribution.
üîπ We are launching the StakeDrop feature ‚Äî earn more bonuses and increased rewards by staking SCRIV.

‚¨áÔ∏è Full update ‚¨áÔ∏è
https://scriv.network/blog/scriv-community-fund-and-stakedrop/

Today the Scriv team launches üìà the trading contest in cooperation with Crex24!¬†

üìú Make the highest trading volumes at https://crex24.com/exchange/SCRIV-BTC to share the total prize pool of 150,000 SCRIV.
üÜì Don't miss the 50 SCRIV bonus by making at least one trade during the contest.
üïí The contest period: 10-17 November 2020.

Learn more ‚¨á
https://scriv.network/blog/scriv-trading-contest-at-crex24/

We have cooperated with our partners from the ZCore Platform, and they have kindly offered 6 months of free SCRIV masternode hosting at their platform for BUY'n'HODL event participants!

Wanna learn how to get it? Read the update
https://scriv.network/blog/what-are-scriv-masternodes-free-hosting/

üöÄ SCRIV NETWORK team is offering up to 10% cashback to anyone who purchases SCRIV from an exchange and holds it for 5+ days.

MORE INFO: https://scriv.network/blog/buynhodl-event/
